attributes.action: Make public sexual harassment a specific criminal offence
attributes.additional_details:
Experiencing public sexual harassment is traumatic, scary and creates a culture where men abuse their power to make women feel inferior. By making this a specific criminal offence we can help create a safer, happier society and prevent women and girls across the country from being sexualised and put in danger from a young age. 
Link to an article by the Guardian on the study: https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/amp.theguardian.com/world/2021/mar/10/almost-all-young-women-in-the-uk-have-been-sexually-harassed-survey-finds
attributes.background: Like over 90% of women and girls in the UK I’ve faced public sexual harassment from a young age. No woman should feel unsafe walking alone that’s why I’m petitioning to make Public Sexual Harassment a specific crime.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940

Sexual harassment could already involve certain offences. If you have been the victim of a crime you should contact the police here: https://www.police.uk/contact/
